nodes.text: This canyon was a steep and barren geographical feature on the planet Naboo. A bridge, which marked one end of Widow's Valley, crossed over the canyon. In 32 BBY, the bridge was destroyed by Lieutenant Gavyn Sykes, who was engaging a Trade Federation Droid Army convoy.
This featureless canyon and the bridge is briefly seen in the 2000 video game Star Wars: Episode I: Battle for Naboo.
Star Wars: Episode I: Battle for Naboo (First appearance)
